title: Release + AWS
description: Production, development and preview environments in your AWS Cloud, your way.
betterDescription: Release and AWS partner to help organizations of all sizes deploy predictable, scalable and isolated environments throughout the whole application lifecycle.
betterCards:
Seamless Integration

Release runs in your AWS account and automatically provisions and de-provisions necessary resources for your environments.

Ease of Billing

Draw down on your spend commitments and get a consolidated bill for all AWS and Release services. Available on Marketplace.

Production-like and Data-rich

All your environments in AWS are as close to production as you need them, with instant access to production-like data.

Cloud Optimized

Release optimizes all your environments,  so you pay for only what you need, when you need it. Now you can spend the freed-up resources on more interesting projects.

Cloud on your terms

Consistent cloud configuration experience when running in multiple clouds. Simplified day-to-day operations, while maintaining full control over the advanced settings.

Preview Programs

Joint customers get access to preview programs of new features and products. Be at the forefront of product development and help shape the solutions that work for you.

title: Release + Codingscape
description: Expert migration and implementation services for Release environments.
betterDescription: Release and Codingscape partner to provide organizations with expert guidance and implementation services for their cloud environment needs.
betterCards:
Expert Migration

Get professional assistance in migrating your existing environments to Release's platform with minimal disruption.

Implementation Support

Receive dedicated support in implementing Release's features and best practices for your specific use cases.

Custom Solutions

Get tailored solutions and integrations that match your organization's unique requirements and workflows.

title: Release + Docker
description: Streamline your container development workflow with Release's Docker integration.
betterDescription: Release and Docker partner to provide developers with seamless container management and deployment capabilities directly from their development environment.
betterCards:
Docker Extension

Access Release's environment management capabilities directly from Docker Desktop with our official extension.

Container Optimization

Automatically optimize container configurations for different environments while maintaining consistency across your deployment pipeline.

Simplified Workflow

Manage your containerized applications and environments directly from your local development workflow.

title: Release + Google Cloud
description: Production, development and preview environments in your Google Cloud, your way.
betterDescription: Release and Google Cloud partner to help organizations of all sizes deploy predictable, scalable and isolated environments throughout the whole application lifecycle.
betterCards:
Seamless Integration

Release runs in your Google Cloud and simplifies infrastructure deployment for even most complex applications.

Optimize cloud spend

With environment pausing and auto-teardown capabilities, you use the cloud resources only when you need them, no wasted spend.

Production-like and Data-rich

All your environments in Google Cloud are as close to production as you need them, with instant access to production-like data.

Kubernetes made simpler

Abstract away the complexities of Kubernetes so developers can focus on your application, not manual cluster setup or writing low-level YAML.

Cloud on your terms

Consistent cloud configuration experience when running in multiple clouds. Simplified day-to-day operations, while maintaining full control over the advanced settings.

Preview Programs

Joint customers get access to preview programs of new features and products. Be at the forefront of product development and help shape the solutions that work for you.

','
Optimize cloud spend

With environment pausing and auto-teardown capabilities, you use the cloud resources only when you need them, no wasted spend.

','
Production-like and Data-rich

title: Welcome to the Future of AI with Release and NVIDIA
description: Bringing self-service AI environments tailored for NVIDIA's powerful GPUs to your fingertips.
featureTitle: Democratizing AI Training, Testing and Deployment
featureList:
• Release is thrilled to be an NVIDIA Inception Program Partner working on cutting edge technologies and solutions for our joint customers.
  • Together we unlock the value in your data by automating the creation of full-stack AI applications for NVIDIA GPUs.
  • Want to join the preview program for new products we're building? Email us at partner@release.com
betterDescription: Release and NVIDIA partner to help organizations deploy and manage AI environments with ease, bringing powerful GPU capabilities to your development workflow.
betterCards:
Automated AI Environments

Release automates the creation of AI environments on the NVIDIA stack, offering a seamless, cost-effective solution for accessing the computational power of GPUs.

Tailored for Your Needs

Customize your AI technology stack with everything from frameworks and foundation models to tools and inference engines, all deployed in your AI infrastructure automatically.

Ephemeral AI Environments

Optimize costs and enhance security with ephemeral AI environments that are activated only when needed, and equipped with guardrails to prevent data mishaps.

title: Release + Tonic
description: Generate high-quality synthetic data for your development and preview environments.
betterDescription: Release and Tonic partner to help organizations maintain data privacy while enabling developers to work with realistic data in their environments.
betterCards:
Synthetic Data Generation

Automatically generate and refresh synthetic data in your Release environments, maintaining data privacy while preserving data relationships and characteristics.

Privacy by Design

Ensure compliance and protect sensitive information while giving developers access to realistic data for testing and development.

Production-like Data

Work with data that maintains the same statistical properties and relationships as production data, ensuring reliable testing and development.
